com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.log.util

Class FutureMessage<M extends Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture<Message>
      • com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.log.util.FutureMessage<M>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Message>, Future<Message>

    public class FutureMessage<M extends Message>
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture<Message>
    Implementation of a Future for Messages that are being added to the Log via Log.add(com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.StaticBuffer). This class can be used by Log implementations to wrap messages.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FutureMessage(M message) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delivered()
      This method should be called by Log implementations when the message was successfully added to the log.
      void failed(Throwable exception)
      This method should be called by implementations when the message could not be added to the log with the respective exception object.
      M getMessage()
      Returns the actual message that was added to the log
      String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractFuture

        addListener, cancel, get, get, interruptTask, isCancelled, isDone, set, setException, wasInterrupted

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
